title: Welcome to HPC-UA 2020!
propose: We propose to examine the relation among High Performance Computing (HPC), Artificial Intelligence, Big Data and visualization, Internet of Things, Embedded HPC as the basic ingredients to create state-of-the-art technologies of the Industry 4.0.
text:
V.M. Glushkov Institute of Cybernetics of NAS of Ukraine, NTUU "Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute" and GlobalLogic Ukraine are pleased to announce the Six International Conference on High Performance Computing (HPC-UA 2020) being held in Kyiv, Ukraine, November, 2020. We are doing our best to increase the success of previous HPC-UA conferences and make it the largest HPC event in Ukraine.
This year GlobalLogic Ukraine is taking part at the HPC conference. "Innovating with a digital mindset" and "Next-gen product development for better business outcomes" are the main messages of GlobalLogic.
IT-industry representatives as well as international speakers will be discussing the themes within the scope of the main sections. Innovative products will be presented on the workshops as part of the proposed format of HPC conference. Everyone, including students and young scientists with their innovative projects can take part in the workshops. Moreover, exhibitions with the participation of GlobalLogic will take place at the conference.
significant:
Conference devoted to the 100th anniversary of Katerina Yushchenko, inventor of pointer and 1st universal Address language. Kateryna was born an 8th of December, but almost a hundred years ago, in 1919. She`s a native of the city of Chigirin, Ukraine.
